name: AquaFresh 10 L RO + UV Water Purifier
reviews: Purifies water very well, taste is much better.

description: A 10-litre RO + UV water purifier suitable for homes with hard water.

reviews: Good capacity for daily use.

description: A 7-litre UV-only water purifier designed for use in areas with safe TDS but microbial contamination.
